definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

pinyin: ke3 kuo4 zhan3 biao1 ji4 yu3 yan2

sentences.english: Spread foundations generally can be classified as wall and column footings.
sentences.chinese: 擴展基礎通常可分爲牆基和柱基。

sentences.english: Implementing customer scenarios to include the flow of defect submissions expands integration coverage.
sentences.chinese: 包含缺陷交付流程的實施客戶場景擴展了集成的範圍。

sentences.english: For those that are not available, should the source applications be extended?
sentences.chinese: 對於不可用的那些，是否應擴展源應用程序？

sentences.english: The Prison University Project has expanded under Ms. Lewen's leadership.
sentences.chinese: 在盧恩女士的領導下，這個監獄大學項目不斷擴展。

sentences.english: The mechanism of high temperature creep associated with the climb of extended dislocations is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了擴展位錯攀移的高溫蠕變機制。

sentences.english: This requirement will gradually expand to include smaller public companies in the future.
sentences.chinese: 這一要求將在未來逐步擴展到包含更小的國有公司。

sentences.english: Analyzing them all is beyond the scope of this article.
sentences.chinese: 分析全部擴展超出了本文的範圍。

sentences.english: It will allow computing to expand in all directions and serve ever more users.
sentences.chinese: 計算向各方向擴展，服務於更多用戶。

sentences.english: Notice the difference between these interfaces and extension points.
sentences.chinese: 請注意這些接口和擴展點之間的區別。

sentences.english: The city sprawls for miles in each direction.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市向四面八方擴展了幾英里。

sentences.english: You should try it out on every product you claim to support.
sentences.chinese: 你應該在擴展支持的所有產品上對其進行測試。

sentences.english: As in Tadasana, lengthen and broaden the soles of both feet.
sentences.chinese: 就像在山式，延長和擴展你雙腳的腳底。

sentences.english: You can extend this pattern to create an entire group of connected nodes.
sentences.chinese: 您可以擴展這一模式，以創建已連節點的整個組。

sentences.english: You can create reusable custom components by extending this class.
sentences.chinese: 通過擴展此類可以創建可重用的定製組件。

sentences.english: Each extension point is unique and defines a contract to be adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 每個擴展點都是惟一的並且定義需要遵守的契約。

sentences.english: I tend to extend the vernacular to include the owner of the software asset, such that
sentences.chinese: 我打算擴展包括軟件資源擁有者在內的這些概念。

definition: to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
